# Dataformer App

### Create synthentic datasets for LLMs.

## 📦 Installation

You can install Dataformer App as such:

```
git clone https://github.com/DataformerAI/dataformer-app.git
make backend
make frontend
```

## ⚡️ Community

Join us on [Discord](https://dataformer.ai/discord)
